word.name: likelihood
word.sample: The likelihood that animals living in forests will become extinct is increased when the forests are cut down.

word.name: counterproductive
word.sample: This phenomenon can be partly attributed to the common counterproductive approach to study, but it also simply reflects the way the brain functions.

word.name: variant
